wizard.title: Deploy Your Paymaster
wizard.subtitle: Complete {{totalSteps}}-step wizard to deploy and register your community Paymaster

step2.title: Register Your Community
step2.subtitle: Lock GToken and register your community, then bind MySBT contract

substep1.title: Connect Your Wallet
substep1.description: Please connect your MetaMask wallet to get started. Make sure you're on the correct network.
substep1.connectPrompt: Please connect your MetaMask wallet to get started
substep1.connectHint: Make sure you have MetaMask installed and are on the correct network

substep2.title: Choose Your Deployment Mode
substep2.description: Select the deployment mode that best fits your needs. We provide two distinct approaches with different resource requirements and operational characteristics.

modeNames.standardSubtitle: AOA (Asset Oriented Abstraction) optimizes traditional ERC-4337 by eliminating off-chain signature servers and on-chain verify cost. Uses SBT identity verification + xPNTs for gas-free payments.
modeNames.superSubtitle: Based on AOA, supports customize gas token and no individual contract deployment needed. Protocol-managed infrastructure for ultimate simplicity.

metaphor.title: Gas Station Metaphor: We Help You Build a Paymaster Gas Station

standard.title: üèóÔ∏è Enhanced ERC-4337:AOA
standard.description: AOA (Asset Oriented Abstraction): Optimizes traditional ERC-4337 by eliminating off-chain signature servers and reducing on-chain verify cost. Use free building materials (open-source code), build and maintain your own gas station. Uses SBT identity verification + xPNTs for gas-free payments. 100% control.
standard.highlight: Key Feature: No off-chain signature server needed. Gas (ETH) needs to be purchased and distributed across chains by yourself.

super.title: ‚ö° Super Mode:AOA+
super.description: AOA+: Based on AOA advantages, supports customize gas token and no individual contract deployment needed. Join SuperPaymaster shared gas station network (like joining a franchise chain). Protocol handles infrastructure, maintenance, and cross-chain operations.
super.highlight: Key Feature: Customize gas token support. Protocol handles cross-chain infrastructure, gas purchase & distribution.

resources.title: ETH (long-term supply) + stGToken
resources.detail1: Sufficient ETH for contract deployment, EntryPoint stake, and ongoing gas sponsorship
resources.detail2: stGToken for governance participation and protocol access
resources.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Requires continuous ETH supply for multi-chain gas operations

maintenance.title: Self-Maintained
maintenance.detail1: Purchase ETH yourself and deposit to EntryPoints on each chain
maintenance.detail2: ‚ö†Ô∏è Bear the cost of managing multiple EntryPoint balances across chains

reputation.title: No Reputation
reputation.detail2: Customers cannot select your service based on Reputation

deployment.title: Deploy Your Own
deployment.detail1: Full control over your Paymaster contract

bestFor.item2: Want complete control over gas budgets
bestFor.item3: Need high degree of protocol compatibility

resources.title: ETH (one-time interaction) + stGToken + aPNTs (long-term supply)
resources.detail1: ETH only for initial transaction gas - no ongoing ETH needed
resources.detail2: stGToken for governance participation and protocol access
resources.detail3: aPNTs as gas backing token - protocol handles cross-chain distribution
resources.success: ‚úÖ No continuous ETH management required, aPNTs handle all gas sponsorship

maintenance.title: Protocol-Managed
maintenance.detail1: Simply deposit aPNTs in SuperPaymaster dashboard
maintenance.detail2: ‚úÖ aPNTs already distributed cross-chain. No manual cross-chain operations needed

reputation.title: Reputation System
reputation.detail2: Higher Reputation = More customer traffic and revenue

bestFor.item2: Don't want to deploy and maintain contracts
bestFor.item4: Focus on community operations rather than tech

previewSteps.title: Preview: What Happens After You Select?

substep3.title: Verify Resource Requirements
substep3.description: Based on your selection, verify that you have the necessary resources. You can acquire missing resources from the provided links.
substep3.notReady: Please ensure all required resources are met

eth.title: ETH:
eth.aoaDescription: Required for deploying contracts and paying gas fees. You need {{amount}} ETH for deployment and staking.
eth.superDescription: Required for transaction gas fees. Super Mode only needs minimal ETH for gas.

gtoken.title: GToken:
gtoken.description: Governance token required for staking. You need GToken in your wallet to lock and receive stGToken credentials. Minimum {{amount}} GToken recommended.

apnts.title: aPNTs:
apnts.description: Advanced PNTs required for SuperPaymaster ({{amount}}+ minimum). Purchase from AAStar Community to enable fast deployment.

step3.title: Choose Stake Option
step3.description: Based on your wallet resources, choose the most suitable staking flow. We'll provide smart recommendations based on your current balance.

suggestion.title: Suggestion (You can choose freely)
suggestion.note: This is just a suggestion based on your current wallet resources. You are free to choose either option at any time.

step4.title: Prepare Resources
step4.description: Ensure your wallet has the following resources. We'll check your balance in real-time to meet {{mode}} requirements.

standard.title: Deposit to EntryPoint
standard.description: Deposit ETH to the EntryPoint contract to fund gas sponsorship for your Paymaster.

eth.title: ETH Balance
eth.faucetNote: Please get Sepolia ETH from faucet

summary.allReadyDescription: You can proceed to the next step to complete the deployment.
summary.notReadyDescription: Please complete the missing resource deployments above, then click "Re-detect".

header.title: Deployment Complete!
header.subtitle: Congratulations! You have successfully completed resource deployment for

step1.description: Deposit ETH to Paymaster to cover gas fees

getGToken.title: Get GToken
getGToken.description: Get protocol access permission GToken, become protocol member, join permissionless, quit anytime freely

deployXPNTs.title: Deploy xPNTs
deployXPNTs.description: Create your community gas token for payment abstraction

launchPaymaster.description: Deploy your Paymaster contract and start serving gasless transactions to your community
launchPaymaster.title: Launch Paymaster

landing.useLaunchWizard: Use Launch Wizard to organize these steps to deploy your community Paymaster
landing.quickStartText: Already have GToken and resources? Use the
landing.trueDecentralizationDesc: No censorship. No single point of failure. Community-operated Paymasters registered on-chain. Anyone can launch, anyone can use.
landing.noTxCensorship: No tx censorship in gas payment
landing.communitySustainabilityDesc: Any community can provide gasless services based on their own services or products, get liquidity and long term revenue.
landing.flexiblePaymentModelsDesc: Pay with any ERC-20 token via PNT (Paymaster Native Token). Operators earn fees, users enjoy gasless transactions.
landing.developerFriendlyDesc: ERC-4337 compliant with simple integration. Drop-in solution for any dApp. Full TypeScript SDK and React hooks.

getSBT.title: Mint My MySBT
getSBT.subtitle: Create a Soul Bound Token for your community identity and record reputation

whatIs.title: What is MySBT?
whatIs.description: MySBT is a public whiteboard on-chain where all communities can freely record and write. It's a non-transferable Soul Bound Token that represents your community identity and activities.
whatIs.concept: Think of MySBT as a shared canvas: communities freely record your activities, you can bind NFTs to enhance reputation, freely join or exit communities, with privacy protection built-in as a public good.

feature1.title: Community Reputation Record
feature1.desc: Record your community reputation based on public contracts

feature2.title: NFT Binding Support
feature2.desc: Bind external NFTs to your SBT

feature3.title: GToken Stake
feature3.desc: Minting requires at least 0.4 GT stake

feature4.title: Binding Limits
feature4.desc: First 10 NFT bindings free, then 1 GT per additional binding

startMint.title: Start Minting MySBT
startMint.description: Connect your wallet to start minting MySBT

flow.title: Mint MySBT for Your Community
flow.description: This SBT will act as a White Board to record all your Community Reputation, based on a MySBT public contract. You need at least 0.4 GT locked. The first time mint should choose an initial Community.

costBreakdown.title: Cost Breakdown
costBreakdown.explanation: When you mint, 0.1 GT will be burned. If you quit later, 0.1 GT goes to treasury for service, and you get 0.2 GT back.

communitySelect.title: Select Initial Community
communitySelect.hint: Choose which community you want to join. You can join more or quit any community later.
communitySelect.label: Choose Community

errors.insufficientGToken: Need at least {{required}} GT, but only have {{current}} GT

warnings.title: Insufficient Balance
warnings.insufficientGToken: Insufficient GToken. Need at least {{required}} GT, current balance: {{current}} GT

success.title: Success!
success.message: Your MySBT has been minted successfully!

operationGuide.title: Community Operator Guide
operationGuide.subtitle: Master the SuperPaymaster ecosystem and build a thriving Web3 community economy

overview.title: Community Operator Guide
overview.description: SuperPaymaster provides a complete toolset for community operators to build a prosperous Web3 community economy. Through gas sponsorship, points systems, and task platforms, transform costs into value and achieve sustainable community development.

lowerBarrier.title: Lower Participation Barrier
lowerBarrier.description: Members don't need to hold ETH to participate in on-chain activities, increasing community engagement

createValue.title: Create Economic Value
createValue.description: Transform gas costs into community revenue, building a sustainable economic model

positiveCycle.title: Form Positive Cycle
positiveCycle.description: Task-points-consumption loop incentivizes continuous member contributions

register.title: Register Community
register.description: Register your community on-chain with basic information and governance tokens

deploy.title: Deploy Tokens
deploy.description: Issue community-exclusive xPNTs points tokens and MySBT identity tokens

launch.title: Launch Paymaster
launch.description: One-click deploy gas sponsorship contract and configure sponsorship rules

gasToken.title: ‚õΩ Gas Token Management
gasToken.description: xPNTs are your community's exclusive points tokens for paying gas fees and internal economic activities. They transform pure cost expenditure into a medium for community value circulation.

gasPayment.title: üí∏ Gas Payment
gasPayment.description: Members use xPNTs to pay for on-chain transaction gas, achieving true 'seamless' experience

taskRewards.title: üéÅ Task Rewards
taskRewards.description: Complete community tasks to earn xPNTs rewards, incentivizing member participation

shopConsumption.title: üõí Shop Consumption
shopConsumption.description: Exchange for exclusive merchandise, limited edition NFTs, service discount coupons in community shop

valueStorage.title: üìä Value Storage
valueStorage.description: As community value certificate, deflation mechanism can be designed to increase value

issuance.title: üìà Issuance Mechanism
items: Inflation rules: Community voting for inflation mechanism can be designed
Initial distribution: 40% treasury + 30% task rewards + 20% team + 10% ecosystem

consumption.title: üî• Consumption Scenarios
items: Gas payment: Main consumption scenario, based on actual gas consumption
Shop exchange: Exchange for exclusive NFTs, merchandise, services
Privilege services: VIP identity, exclusive feature unlocking

support.title: üí∞ Value Support
items: Community treasury: Regular buyback and burn to support token value
Service revenue: Paymaster service fee revenue injected into treasury
Ecosystem cooperation: Cooperate with external projects to provide exchange scenarios

actionBox.title: üéØ Operation Suggestions
items: Reasonable total supply: Set token total supply based on community scale, avoid inflation
Multiple consumption scenarios: Create rich consumption scenarios, maintain token demand
Regular buyback: Use part of revenue for buyback and burn, support token value
Transparent governance: Establish community governance mechanism, let members participate in token economic decisions

revenue.title: üí∞ Revenue Model Analysis
revenue.description: Based on on-chain data analysis, typical L2 active users' monthly gas cost is about $1.95. Through SuperPaymaster, communities can transform this pure cost into stable revenue.

gasService.title: üí∏ Gas Service Fee
gasService.description: Charge 2-5% gas service fee, this is the most direct revenue source

shopRevenue.title: üè™ Shop Revenue
shopRevenue.description: Revenue from selling NFTs, merchandise, services in community shop

cooperationRevenue.title: ü§ù Cooperation Revenue
cooperationRevenue.description: Revenue from cooperating with external projects to provide promotion services

dataService.title: üìä Data Service
dataService.description: Provide anonymous community data analysis services to research institutions

actionBox.title: üéØ Revenue Optimization Strategy
items: Tiered services: Provide differentiated services for different user levels
Dynamic rates: Adjust service fee rates based on network congestion
Value-added services: Provide priority processing, exclusive support and other value-added services
Ecosystem expansion: Connect more DApps to expand service scope

footer.title: Need More Help?
footer.description: Contact our technical support team for professional community operation guidance
